talents.name: Helborgâ€™s Tutelage
changes: No longer prevents random crits from occurring.

talents.name: Enhanced Training
changes: Target requirement decreased from 4 to 3.

huntsman.name: huntsman
passives: Call Out Weakness: Range (radius) of aura increased from 5 to 20.
Poacher's Mark: Reload Speed increased by 15% (moved from Ult).
Ultimate : CD decreased from 90s to 75s, Reload Speed bonus decreased from 40% to 25% (i.e. 15% moved to passive).

talents.name: Burst of Enthusiasm
changes: Changed from THP on ranged Headshot/Crit to THP on ranged kill with the THP being 25% of Kill THP (Bloodlust) Value.

talents.name: Longshanks
changes: Replaced: Ranged weapons, except blunderbuss, have pinpoint accuracy and no 'Aim Punch'.

foot-knight.name: foot knight
passives: CDR from Damage Taken: Decreased from 0.5 to 0.35.
Protective Presence: Aura DR decreased from 15% to 10%, Range (radius) of Aura increased from 5 to 20.
Ultimate: CD increased from 30s to 40s, Cleave of baseline ult (not battering ram) increased by 100% (from 2 to 4), Ending explosion radius of baseline ult (not battering ram) increased by ~33%.

talents.name: Have at Thee!
changes: Duration increased from 10s to 15s.

talents.name: Crowd Clearer
changes: Duration increased from 3s to 5s.

talents.name: Staggering Force
changes: Additional Stagger Power decreased from 35% to 20%.

talents.name: It's Hero Time
changes: CDR decreased from 100% to 70%.
If someone is already incapacitated, the default talent does not trigger if a 2nd person becomes incapacitated; it now does so.

talents.name: Inspiring Blow
changes: Only affects FK, not allies.
Duration increased from 0.5s to 1.5s.
Bonus cooldown regeneration increased from 100% to 200%.

talents.name: Virtue of Knightly Temper
changes: Required HP threshold to crit insta kill changed from 4x damage dealt to 3x damage dealt (i.e. must deal more damage to trigger).

talents.name: Virtue of the Penitent
changes: Now requires 500 kills per strength potion on Cata 3.

talents.name: Virtue of the Impetuous Knight
changes: Duration increased from 15s to 25s.
In addition, 30% CDR added.

talents.name: Virtue of Confidence
changes: Damage Cleave lowered to 0.5 from infinite.
Heavy Linesman added.
Hitbox starts at 0.05s instead of 0.15s into animation.

weapons.name: Bretonnian Longsword
changes: Light 2: Damage on 2nd Target increased by 60%, Damage on 3rd Target increased by 50%.
Heavies 1 and 2: Damage Cleave increased by 30%, Stagger Cleave increased by 30%.

weapons.name: Great Hammer
changes: Push Attack: Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 50%.
Heavies: Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 50%, Attack Speed increased by ~33%.

weapons.name: Greatsword
changes: Lights: Finesse Coefficient increased by ~33%, Damage Cleave increased by ~14%, Damage on 1st Target increased by 10%, Damage on 2nd Target decreased by 10%, Damage on 3rd Target increased by ~17%.

Push Attack: Attack Speed increased by ~14%, Damage decreased by 50%, Stagger decreased by 20%,  Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 25%, Non-Crit Armor Damage increased by 60%, Non-Crit Super Armor Damage increased by 60%, Non-Crit Monster Damage increased by 60%, Infantry Crit Multiplier increased by 25%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 60%, Super Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 60%, Monster Crit Multiplier increased by 60%, Heavies Damage on 1st Target decreased by 10%, Damage on 2nd Target increased by ~14%, Damage on 4th Target decreased by ~17%, Damage on 5th Target and above increased by 40%, Non-Crit Armor Damage on 1st Target decreased by ~17%, Non-Crit Armor Damage on 2nd Target decreased by ~33%, Non-Crit Zerker Damage decreased by ~40%.

weapons.name: Halberd
changes: Overall, damage is increased and spread more evenly across attacks.
Light 1: Damage Cleave increased by ~45%, Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 25%, Damage on 2nd Target increased by 50%, Damage on 3rd Target increased by 50%.
Light 2: Damage increased by 25%, Non-Crit Armor Damage increased by 180%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 100%.

Light 3 and Push Attack: Finesse Coefficient increased by 50%, Headshot/Crit Curve changed from Smiter to Ninja (higher headshot or crit damage, but the same headshot crit damage), Non-Crit Armor and Super Armor Damage decreased by 5%, Armor and Super Armor Crit Multipliers decreased by 5%.
Heavy 1: Non-Crit Armor Damage increased by ~24%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 12%.
Heavy 2: Damage increased by 38%, Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 15%, Time to chain into attack from L1 decreased from 0.65 to 0.5.

weapons.name: Mace & Sword
changes: Light 1 and 2 (Mace): Damage profile changed to be similar to L1/L2 of Kruber 1H Mace,  Finesse Coefficient increased by ~33%, Damage on 1st Target increased by ~30%, Damage Cleave increased by 15%, Tank added, Non-Crit Armor Damage added, Non-Crit Super Armor Damage added, Non-Crit Zerker Damage decreased by 25%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 100%, Zerker Crit Multiplier decreased by 25%.

Light 3 and 4 (Sword): Damage profile changed to be similar to L1/L2 of Kruber 1H Sword, Damage increased by ~20%, Finesse Coefficient increased by ~33%, Headshot/Crit Curve changed from Linesman to Ninja (higher headshot or crit damage, but the same headshot crit damage).

Push Attack: Damage Cleave decreased by ~25%, Finesse Coefficient decreased by ~33%, Headshot/Crit Curve is Tank, Total Damage increased by ~1%, Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by ~5%, Non-Crit Armor Damage increased by ~300%, Non-Crit Monster Damage increased by ~67%, Non-Crit Zerker Damage increased by ~3%, Non-Crit Super Armor Damage increased by 300%.
Heavies: Damage Cleave decreased by ~45%, Zerker Crit Multiplier decreased by 40%, Stagger Cleave increased by 20%.

weapons.name: Spear and Shield
changes: Light 2: Tank added.

Heavy 2: Finesse Coefficient increased by ~167%, Damage on 1st Target decreased by ~16%, Stagger on 1st Target increased by 35%, Damage on 2nd Target increased by 170%, Stagger on 2nd Target increased by ~237%, Non-Crit Armor Damage increased by 60%, Non-Crit Super Armor Damage increased by 60%, Non-Crit Monster Damage increased by ~23%, Non-Crit Armor Stagger decreased by 40%, Non-Crit Super Armor Stagger decreased by 40%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 60%, Super Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 60%, Monster Crit Multiplier increased by 60%, Stagger Armor Crit Multiplier decreased by 20%, Stagger Super Armor Crit Multiplier decreased by 50%.

weapons.name: 1H Mace
changes: Dodge Count increased from 3 to 4.

Lights 1 and 2: Finesse Coefficient increased by ~33%, Damage on 1st Target increased by ~30%, Damage Cleave increased by 15%, Non-Crit Armor Damage added, Non-Crit Super Armor Damage added, Non-Crit Zerker Damage decreased by 25%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 100%, Zerker Crit Multiplier decreased by 25%.
Light 3 and 4: Finesse Coefficient increased by 100%, Non-Crit Zerker Damage increased by ~67%, Non-Crit Monster Damage increased by 20%, L4 Attack Speed increased by ~23%.
Heavies: Range increased by 20%, Non-Crit Zerker Damage increased by ~33%, Non-Crit Monster Damage increased by ~43%.

weapons.name: 1H Sword
changes: Dodge Count increased from 3 to 4.
Light 1 and 2: Damage on 1st Target decreased by ~5%, Damage on 2nd Target decreased by ~19%, Damage on 3rd Target and above increased by ~67%, Headshot/Crit Curve changed from Linesman to Ninja.
Light 3: Range increased by 20%, Shield Break added.

Heavies: Damage Cleave decreased by ~33%, Stagger Cleave decreased by 25%, Damage on 1st Target increased by ~9%, Damage on 2nd Target decreased by ~3%, Damage on 3rd Target decreased by ~33%, Non-Crit Armor Damage on 1st Target increased by ~8%, Non-Crit Super Armor Damage on 1st Target increased by ~8%, Non-Crit Monster Damage on 1st Target increased by 100%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 30%, Super Armor Crit Multiplier increased by 30%, Monster Crit Multiplier increased by 150%, Range increased by ~15%, Headshot/Crit Curve changed from Tank to Ninja, Finesse Coefficient decreased by 25%.

weapons.name: Empire Longbow
changes: Zoom on charged shot changed from automatic to manual trigger (via weapon special).
Spread, timings, and other stuff tweaked to decrease the 'jolty stiffness' after shooting.
Partial/Full charge given quick arrow chained action.
Quick Shot: Finesse Coefficient decreased by 20%, Boost Coefficient decreased by 52%.
Full Charge: Non-Crit Armor Damage increased by 25%, Monster Crit Multiplier decreased by ~33%.

weapons.name: Handgun
changes: Dropoff start range increased by 60% and dropoff end range increased by 100%.

ranger-veteran.name: ranger veteran
passives: Fast Hands: In addition Ranged Power increased by 10%.
Effective range for Ranged weapons increased by 100%.

talents.name: Foe Feller
changes: Bonus attack speed increased from 5% to 15%.

talents.name: Drunken Brawler
changes: Time to drink Ale decreased from 1.9s to 0.8s.

talents.name: Scavenger
changes: Proc chance decreased from 20% to ~6%.
Bombs can no longer drop.
Guaranteed supply drop every 14-17 special kills, and can never get the same potion twice in a row.

talents.name: Exuberance
changes: DR decreased from 30% to 20%.

talents.name: Parting Gift
changes: Bomb-dupe buff now has a finite duration of 10s

talents.name: Surprise Guest
changes: In addition: 30% CDR added.

ironbreaker.name: iron breaker
passives: CDR from Damage Taken: Decreased from 0.5 to 0.4.

talents.name: A Thousand Cuts
changes: Increased attack speed increased to 15% (from 10%).

talents.name: Hack and Slash
changes: Increased critical hit chance increased to 10% (from 5%).

talents.name: Impatience
changes: In addition -5% dodge range per stack of Trophy Hunter added.

talents.name: Adrenaline Surge
changes: Ult Recharge rate changed to 67% per stack of Trophy Hunter instead of 200% only when at full (3) stacks (i.e. still 200% at 3 stacks).

talents.name: Barge
changes: In addition: 10% dodge range and 15% damage reduction added.

weapons.name: Dual Axes
changes: Push:  Push changed from regular push to light push, stamina cost decreased from 2 to 1, weaker stagger
Heavies: H1 Attack Speed decreased by ~11%, H2 Attack Speed increased by ~6%, Bonus Crit Chance of 20% added to H3.

weapons.name: Greataxe
changes: Light 3: Attack speed increased by ~10%.
Push Attack: Stagger Cleave increased by ~140%, Bonus Crit Chance of 10% added.
Heavies: Armor Sliding and Heavy Linesman added, Damage Cleave increased by ~71%, Damage on 3rd Target increased by 100%, Non-Crit Armor Damage decreased by ~33%.

weapons.name: Great Hammer
changes: Push Attack: Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 50%.
Heavies: Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 50%, Attack Speed increased by ~33%.

weapons.name: 1H Axe

weapons.name: 1H Hammer
changes: Dodge Count increased from 3 to 4.

weapons.name: War Pick
changes: Dodge count increased from 2 to 3.

Damage against 1st Target increased by 12.5%, Damage against 2nd Target increased by 110%, Damage against 3rd Target increased by ~87%, Damage against 4th Target and above increased by 50%, Non-Crit Infantry Damage on 1st Target increased by 25%, Non-Crit Armor Damage on 1st Target increased by 50%, Non-Crit Monster Damage on 1st Target increased by 50%, Non-Crit Infantry Damage on 2nd Target and above decreased by 10%, Non-Crit Armor Damage on 2nd Target and above decreased by 100%, Non-Crit Super Armor Damage on 2nd Target and above decreased by 100%, Non-Crit Monster Damage on 2nd Target and above increased by 50%, Monster Crit Multiplier increased by 50%,  Attack Speed increased by ~31%.

weapons.name: Drakegun
changes: Alt Fire: Damage Interval increased by 20%, Does not affect DoT, Target cap decreased from 50 enemies to 19 enemies.

weapons.name: Handgun
changes: Dropoff start range increased by 60% and dropoff end range increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Trollhammer Torpedo
changes: Reload Duration increased from 3s to 4s.
AoE damage against Armor and Super Armor decreased by 50%.
Outer explosion radius damage against Infantry, Armor, and Super Armor decreased.
Strength Coefficient of both the projectile and explosion decreased by 50%.

waystalker.name: waystalker
passives: Amaranthe: <50% HP threshold removed; now regen heals at any % HP.
If there is THP, Regen does not replace THP with Green HP, and instead heals on top of that THP.

Ultimate (Trueshot Volley) (Non-Piercing Version): CD decreased from 80s to 65s, Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 50% (from 1 to 1.5) and Non-Crit Bodyshot Super Armor Damage increased by 140% (from 0.25 to 0.6) (3 arrows should 1-shot headshot C3 Maulers), Cleave increased by 50% (from 0.25 to 0.375), FF decreased to 0.

talents.name: Drakira's Alacrity
changes: Bonus Attack Speed increased from 15% to 20%.
Duration increased from 5s to 10s.

talents.name: Isha's Embrace
changes: Bonus to Amaranthe regen increased from 50% to 100%.

talents.name: Spirit Arrows
changes: Replaced.
Amaranthe gives 5% of max ammo to Waystalker per tick.
Does not remove the regen of Amaranthe.

talents.name: Piercing Shot
changes: FF decreased by 75%.

handmaiden.name: handmaiden
passives: NEW 'Bendy': Gives 30% DR.
Renewal: Range (radius) of Aura increased from 5 to 20.

talents.name: Focused Spirit
changes: No longer grants generic Power,  instead grants Melee Power.
Bonus Melee Power increased from 15% to 30%.
Time required to activate the buff decreased from 10s to 4s.
Buff is no longer broken by FF.

talents.name: Oak Stance
changes: Bonus Crit Chance increased from 5% to 10%.

talents.name: Asrai Alacrity
changes: Number of buffed strikes increased from 2 to 3.

talents.name: Dance of Blades
changes: Bonus Power increased from 10% to 15%.
Duration increased from 2s to 3.5s.

talents.name: Heart of Oak
changes: Bonus Max Health increased from 15% to 20%.

talents.name: Quiver of Plenty
changes: Bonus Ammunition increased from 40% to 70%.

talents.name: Power From Pain
changes: Hitbox to gain Crit Chance stacks increased.

Length increased from 0.4 to 0.5.

shade.name: shade
passives: Blur: Parry window increased by 50% (from 0.5 to 0.75).
Ultimate (Infiltrate): Duration reduced by 50% (from 5 to 2.5 seconds), Damage against monsters increased by ~15%.

talents.name: Cruelty
changes: Critical strike damage bonus increased to 80% (from 50%).
Now also grants 5% bonus Crit Chance.

talents.name: Bloodfletcher
changes: Backstabs now return 5% of maximum ammo.

talents.name: Cloak of Pain
changes: Dual weapons no longer sometimes consume both charges of ult instead of 1 with a single attack.

talents.name: Shimmer Strike
changes: Limited to a total of 4 attacks during ult.

sister-of-the-thorn.name: sister of the thorn
passives: A Sustenance of Leechlings: THP leech decreased from 100% to 10%.
Ultimate (Thornwake): CD increased from 40s to 60s.

talents.name: Bonded Spirit
changes: Radiance CDR bonus decreased from 50% to 25%.

talents.name: Radiant Inheritance
changes: Duration increased by 100% (from 10 to 20 seconds).

talents.name: Ironbark Thicket
changes: Increased duration removed (decreased from 10s to default 6s).

talents.name: Blackvenom Thicket (Bush)
changes: In addition: 30% CDR added.

weapons.name: Dual Daggers
changes: Stamina increased from 4 to 6.
Light 1 and 2: Bonus Crit Chance of 10% added.
Heavies: Weapon chaining after H1/H2 made smoother.

weapons.name: Dual Swords
changes: Light 1 and 2: Damage Cleave increased by 20%, Damage on 1st Target increased by ~48%, Finesse Coefficient on 1st Target increased by ~33%,  Strength Coefficient on 1st Target increased by 100%, Damage on 2nd Target increased by  ~67%, Finesse Coefficient on 2nd Target increased by 100%, Headshot/Crit Curve on 2nd Target changed from Linesman to Ninja, Damage on 3rd Target and on increased by ~67%, Armor Crit Multiplier increased by ~67%, Non-Crit Infantry Damage lowered by 32%, Infantry Crit Multiplier decreased by 40%, Monster Crit Multiplier decreased by 40%.

Heavy 2: Non-Crit Berserker damage decreased 40%.

weapons.name: Elf Greatsword

Heavy 1:Now shares a damage profile with Heavy 2, Linesman removed.

weapons.name: Javelin

weapons.name: Swift Bow

Charged Shot: Damage at near range increased by 10%, Damage at near range increased by ~17%, Damage Cleave increased by ~66%, Stagger Cleave increased by ~66%.

bounty-hunter.name: bounty hunter
passives: Blessed Shots: Part of Blessed Combat added.
Blessed Shot cooldown resets when Bounty Hunter kills a creature with a melee attack.

talents.name: Blessed Combat
changes: Feature where killing an enemy with a melee attack resets cooldown of Blessed Shot is removed from the talent and now a passive.

talents.name: Blessed Combat
changes: Ranged hits now also grants up to the next 6 melee strikes 15% increased attack speed.

changes: Maximum amount of DR decreased from 30% to 20%.

changes: CDR on headshot increased from 60% to 80%.

changes: No longer grants generic Power, instead grants Melee Power.

Provides the team with 10% increased movement speed.

weapons.name: 1H Sword

weapons.name: Bolt Staff
changes: Full Charge: Non-Crit Infantry Damage increased by 1%, Non-Crit Armor Damage increased by ~7%.

weapons.name: Conflagration Staff
changes: Primary Fire: Damage against near targets increased by ~25%, Damage against far targets increased by 100%.
Alt Fire: Damage on full charge increased by ~67%, Ground-fire duration increased from 2s to 10s, Time between ticks increased from 1s to 2s (total ticks increased from 1 to 5, so still buffed).

weapons.name: Coruscation Staff
changes: Primary Fire: Effective Attack Speed increased by ~13% [Animation Time decreased by 35%, Heat Cost decreased by ~33%, Increased the number of pellets by ~67%, Damage decreased by ~15-25%, Chain Timing to swap weapons out of Coruscation increased by 25%

weapons.name: Fireball Staff

Alt Fire: Ignores Shields, Damage increased by 25%, Damage Cleave increased by 20%, Stagger Cleave increased by 20%, Non-Crit Zerker damage increased by 1200%.
Explosion: Ignores Shields.

weapons.name: Flamestorm Staff
